attributes.action: tax cars based on their CO2 emissions and mileage together.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unfair to penalise band G cars if they have low annual mileages.  Lower band cars with high mileages have considerably higher annual CO2 emissions.  The only equitable solution is to increase fuel duty and first year tax in order to target the most polluting and high mileage cars.
